back_text: Deck Size: 30. Trait Choice: At deck creation, choose 1 trait: Relic or Spirit. Deckbuilding Options: Guardian cards ([guardian]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, up to 10 other cards of the chosen trait level 0-3. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Level 0 Kokorowatari(Replica), Koyomi Araragi, Princess Beauty, 1 random basic weakness. Additional Requirements: You begin the game with Koyomi Araragi (Half-Vampire) in play. Set aside the level 4 Kokorowatari(Replica) copy as an upgrade.
name: Shinobu Oshino
text: Each Ally asset you control gains Linked. [reaction] After you defeat an enemy - eat its remains: Heal 1 damage. (Limit once per phase.) [elder_sign] effect: +0 If this test results in defeating an enemy, resolve Shinobu Oshino's "[reaction]" ability an additional time.

back_text: Deck Size: 30. Trait Choice: At deck creation, choose either Spirit, Talent, or both traits. Deckbuilding Options: Seekers cards ([seeker]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, up to 10 other cards of the chosen trait level 0-3(level 0 if you chose both traits, instead), Guardian cards ([guardian]) level 0. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Black Hanekawa, Kako, 1 random basic weakness.
name: Tsubasa Hanekawa
text:
[reaction] After 1 or more horror is placed on Tsubasa Hanekawa, take 1 additional horror: Discover 1 clue at your locations.(Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +2. You may either take 1 direct horror, heal 1 horror, or ready Black Hanekawa.

back_text: Deck Size: 30. Trait Choice: At deck creation, choose 2 out of 3 traits: Cursed, Trick, Tactic. Deckbuilding Options: Rogue cards ([rogue]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, up to 15 other cards of the chosen traits level 0-3. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Monkey Paw, Valhalla Combo, The Rainy Devil, 1 random basic weakness.
name: Suruga Kanbaru
text:
[reaction] After you evade an enemy: Place 1 charge on Monkey Paw.(Limit once per phase.)
[elder_sign] effect: +2. Place 1 charge in Monkey Paw.

back_text: Deck Size: 30. Trait Choice: At deck creation, choose either Spell or Ritual to be a primary trait and a secondary trait. Deckbuilding Options: Mystic cards ([mystic]) level 0-3, Neutral cards level 0-5, cards of the chosen primary trait level 0-5, up to 10 other cards of the chosen secondary trait level 0-2. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Unlimited Rulebook ("I said with a posed look."), Unlimited Rulebook (Secession Version), Anatta, 1 random basic weakness.
name: Yotsugi Ononoki
text: You get +1 to each of your skills for every two non-permanent Spell or Ritual assets you control. [reaction] After your turn begins: Play a Spell or Ritual asset from your hand, reducing its cost by 2. [elder_sign] effect: +1. If you succeed, you may put a Spell or Ritual asset from your hand into play.

back_text: Deck Size: 35. Trait Choice: At deck creation, either choose Insight or no trait. Deckbuilding Options: If you chose Insight: Insight cards level 0-5, Survivor cards ([survivor]) level 0-2, Neutral cards level 0-5. If you chose no trait: Survivor cards ([survivor]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, up to 10 other Insight cards level 0-2. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): 2 copies of Limitless Stationery, Weightlessness, High-ranking Cult Member, 1 random basic weakness.
name: Hitagi Senjougahara
text: [action] :Draw. Either draw 1 card, or choose and discard 1 card from your hand. You may take an additinal action during your turn, which can only be used to draw. [elder_sign] effect: +0. You may choose and discard 1 card from your hand to automatically succeed, instead.

name: Kokorowatari(Replica)
text: Exceptional. Shinobu Oshino deck only. [free] During your turn, take 2 damage and exhaust Kokorowatari (Replica): You may take an additional action, which only can be used to trigger the "[action]" ability below. [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack.

name: Kokorowatari(Replica)
text: Exceptional. Shinobu Oshino deck only. [free] During your turn, take 2 damage and exhaust Kokorowatari (Replica): Fight. You get +3 [combat] and deal +2 damage for this attack. If this attack defeats an enemy, ready Kokorowatari(Replica). Fight. You get +2 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack.

name: Koyomi Araragi
text: Permanent. Shinobu Oshino deck only. [reaction] After you heal 1 or more damage from Koyomi Araragi, exhaust him: Draw 1 card. Forced - When Koyomi Araragi is defeated: Removed all damage from him and flip him. Backside Permanent.(You cannot assign damage to Koyomi Araragi.) You get -3 [combat]. [action][action]: Flip Koyomi Araragi. Then place 2 damage on him.

name: Princess Beauty
text: Revelation - Remove all damage from Koyomi Araragi(Half Vampire) and flip him. If Koyomi Araragi is already flipped to his (Half-dead) side, take 1 horror and shuffle Princess Beauty back into your deck.

name: Black Hanekawa
text: Permanent. Tsubasa Hanekawa deck only. While Tsubasa Hanekawa has 3 or fewer remaining sanity, Black Hanekawa gains: "Switch the base values of your [intellect] and [combat]. Switch the base values of your [willpower] and [agility]. [reaction] After you deal damage to an enemy by an attack, exhaust Black Hanekawa: Energy Drain. Either deal 1 additinal damage or heal 1 horror.

name: Kako
text:
While Kako is in your hand, you cannot trigger [reaction] abilities.
 X is your remaining sanity. Remove Kako from the game.

name: Monkey Paw
text:
Premanent. Suruga Kanbaru deck only. Uses (0 charges). Limit 6 charges on Monkey Paw.
[reaction] When your turn begins, spend up to 6 charges: For every 2 charges spent as part of this ability's cost; you may take an additional action this turn.

name: Valhalla Combo
text: Suruga Kanbaru deck only. Play only during your turn. Engage.Evade. Choose a revealed location. Move to that location if you are not already there. Engage all enemies at that location. One at a time, attempt to evade each enemy that you have engaged. For each enemy you have successsfully evaded, pace 1 charge on Monkey Paw.

name: The Rainy Devil
text: If there are 1 or fewer charges on Monkey Pawm, shuffle The Rainy Devil back into your deck. Otherwise for every 2 charges on Monkey Paw, you must either deal 2 damage to another investigator at your loctation or take 1 horror.

name: Unlimited Rulebook
text:
Yotsugi Ononoki deck only.
[action] Return Unlimited Rulebook to your hand and take 1 horror: Reveal 8 tokens from the chaos bag. For each token with an odd modifier you reveal, deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: Unlimited Rulebook
text:
Yotsugi Ononoki deck only.
[action] Return Unlimited Rulebook to your hand and take 1 damage: Disengage from each enemy engaged with you and move to any revealed location. You may move another investigator at this location from this ability as well. If you do, that investigator takes 1 damage. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: Anatta
text: Revelation - Name either Spell or Ritual. Discard each asset you control that has the named trait. If no assets are discarded by this effect, take 1 horror and shufffle Anatta back into your deck.

name: Weightlessness
text:
Hitagi Senjougahara deck only.
[reaction] After you discard 1 or more cards from your hand, exhaust Weightlessness: Draw 1 card or gain 1 resource.

name: Limitless Stationery
text: Hitagi Senjougahara deck only. Limitless Stationery cannot be played or committed from your hand. Discover 1 clue at your location. [reaction] After you discard Limitless Stationery from your hand during your turn: Play it. (Limit 1 Introspection ability per discard.)

name: High-ranking Cult Member
text:
<b>Prey<b/> - Hitagi Senjougahara only.
Ambush.Hunter.
<b>Forced<b/> - After you draw 1 or more cards or discard 1 or more cards from your hand during your turn while High-ranking Cult Member is engaged with you: It attacks you.
